name: Whereby
description: Integrate with Whereby to create, get, delete and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Create Meeting
tools.description: Create a new Whereby video meeting room. Specify an end date and optional room settings.

tools.name: Get Meeting
tools.description: Get details of a specific Whereby meeting room by its meeting ID.

tools.name: Delete Meeting
tools.description: Delete a Whereby meeting room by its meeting ID. The room URL will no longer be accessible.

tools.name: List Meetings
tools.description: List all active Whereby meeting rooms. Returns room URLs, modes, and expiration dates.
